Name: Parlay Punch
Ingredients: 30 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Too many of these tangy punches and you'll be parleying till dawn.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered at Vortex Bar, Atlanta, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Parlay Punch contains 226 calories
